description:
Non-material amendment of planning permission ref: P010342 dated 10 September 2003 for the 'Erection of basement and seven storey building (gross floorspace 7296 sq.m.) containing A1 ground floor retail units on Great Sutton Street with return frontage to Goswell Road, an A3 basement and ground floor restaurant on Clerkenwell Road and a C1 hotel with basement  fitness centre in the remainder of the new building.  Use of upper floors of 'Hat and Feathers' public house as additional hotel accommodation and linking of them to the new hotel'.  The non-material amendments are:
A]	reduction in the usable floor area of the lower ground floor from 1278.36sqm to 621sqm (-657.4sqm) to accommodate a double height meeting room / breakout space at basement level with a 4.65m floor to ceiling height;
B]	increase in the usable floor area of the basement level from 241.8sqm to 945sqm (+703.2sqm); and
C]	reconfiguration of the lower ground and basement levels to enable compliance with fire escape requirements, accommodate the servicing and riser requirements and to accommodate additional rooms / storage to enable the effective operation of the hotel use.
